description: These decadent vegan chocolate cookies are studded with crunchy pecans and rich chocolate chips! Easy to make and perfect for dunking in a big glass of almond milk.
name: The Ultimate Vegan Chocolate Cookies
recipeIngredient: 1 cup vegan butter, (brought to room temperature)
1/3 cup unflavored and unsweetened vegan yogurt

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350°F and line a couple of baking sheets with parchment paper.
Use an electric mixer to beat the butter and brown sugar together in a large mixing bowl for about 1 minute, until creamy.
Add the yogurt and vanilla, and beat the mixture again just until blended.

Begin adding the flour, about 1/2 cup at a time, beating in each addition before adding the next. When you get to the final addition, sprinkle the cocoa, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt over the flour before beating it in.
Use a large spoon to stir the oats in. The dough will be thick — use your hands to work the oats in if needed.
Fold in the chocolate chips and pecans.
Scoop out 2 to 3 tablespoon-sized dollops of dough and arrange them on the baking sheet, leaving about an inch and a half between each dollop.
Bake the cookies for 10 to 12 minutes.
Remove the baking sheets from the oven and transfer them to a cooling rack.
Optionally, sprinkle the tops of the cookies with coarse sea salt.
Allow the cookies to cool before removing them from the baking sheets.
